title: New: Unknown – #009
body:
If, like me, you’re sick of hearing ‘Na na na na na na na’ at every single ‘British’ celebration since 1990 (and also slightly scared by Paul McCartney’s ever thinning nose), then the comforting sounds of **Unknown** could be the ideal antidote.

Now with nine tracks to his name, the elusive producer would potentially have enough material for his debut LP, and given the strength of each and every composition, it’d certainly be a success. With his minimal approach and sampling skills, _#009_ carves out a slick and ever-so melancholic path down which **Unknown** wanders, controlling and caressing the listener throughout. Check it out below.
